message: Hi, I just had my sofa delivered, but I’m really upset about how the delivery person behaved. They were rude and didn’t handle the sofa carefully.

Hi. Welcome to SofaNest, my name is Chris. I’m so sorry to hear about your experience with our delivery team, and I completely understand how upsetting this must have been. Let me make this right for you. Before we proceed, let’s run through security. Could you please confirm your reference number?
Thank you for that. Could you also confirm your email address and name so I can locate your order?
My email is john.doe@example.com, and my name is John Doe.
Thank you, John. That’s all correct. Let me recap: your reference number is 54321-6789, your email is john.doe@example.com, and your name is John Doe. Is that right?
Thank you. Let’s talk about what works for you. Could you share more details about what happened during the delivery?
The delivery person seemed annoyed when I asked them to be careful moving the sofa through the door. They rolled their eyes, and I saw them bump it against the wall. It was really unprofessional.

I’m really sorry to hear about this, John. That’s not the standard of service we aim to provide. I completely understand your frustration, and I’ll make sure this feedback is escalated to our delivery management team for immediate review.
Can you give me the approximate time of delivery and describe any visible damage to the sofa or your property?
They arrived around 10:30 am. Thankfully, I don’t see any damage to the sofa, but there’s a scuff mark on the wall.

Thank you for providing those details, John. I’ve documented this incident and escalated it to our delivery management team. They’ll investigate the behavior of the delivery personnel and address this with them directly.
To address the scuff mark on your wall, we’d be happy to arrange a professional cleaner or reimburse you for repair costs. What would you consider a satisfactory resolution?
I think reimbursement would be easier. I can send a photo of the damage and the receipt once it’s fixed.
That sounds perfect. Please email the photo and receipt to support@sofanest.com, and we’ll process the reimbursement as soon as possible. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s all. Thanks for taking this seriously.
You’re very welcome, John. I’m truly sorry for your experience, and I appreciate your patience while we resolve this. Have a great day, and thank you for choosing SofaNest!
